Capacity of Athey Trailers figured to include to top of gates only. Amphibious 21/2-ton truck and amphibious Tractor capacities are figured to top of gunwale. --6-- Water Proofing of Vehicles Introduction Vehicles must be water-conditioned for amphibious operations. Even on ideal beaches, where there is a normal rise or fall of tide, hazards of weather, abnormal tides, or the possibility of a boat wave missing the correct beach may result in the landing craft grounding some distance from dry land. This will necessitate movement of the vehicle to shore in water above its safe fording depth, which varies form one foot five inches, (1'5") on up. In the case
